subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nassau Coliseum has served as the home of the Islanders since 1972, but the team will move to Barclays Center in Brooklyn beginning with the 2015-16 season.
snippet: Nassau Coliseum has served as the home of the Islanders since 1972, but the team will move to Barclays Center in Brooklyn beginning with the 2015-16 season.
